name: Connect the Apocalypse
description:
CONNECT THE APOCALYPSE is a fast-paced 2D endless runner game that takes place inside the board game "Connect Four". The game may appear to be innocuous, family fun on the outside; inside, though, an entire planet is ravaged as the checkers are placed down. You control a lone individual living within the game, trying in vain to escape their inevitable doom. Run, jump, roll, and jump again to avoid the endless falling checkers, delaying extinction for as long as you possibly can!

Includes:

  • 18 unique challenge levels
  • 8 different checker types
  • 7 unlockable upgrades
  • An endless nightmare!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump and double-jump
  • Shift to roll
  • Q to return to the menu
  • Tab to toggle fullscreen
  • M to mute/unmute the game
  • ESC to quit
